## GerstnerWaveGenerator.getWaveAmplitude() method

Gets the amplitude of the wave.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getWaveAmplitude(waveIndex: number): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  waveIndex | number | index of the wave to set. |

**Returns:**

number

Amplitude of the wave.
